info.name: Dark Phoronix
info.description: Darkens the Phoronix website and their forum. Also makes some minor fixes to their site.
info.additionalInfo:
License can be viewed here: https://userstyles.org/users/277242

Made benchmark and benchmark information easier to read by tweaking colors. Also removed shadows from benchmark text.

Initial version.
